{"id":886624991,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4Â months","timestamp":1674879921,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/886624991/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"String to Integer (atoi)","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    bool isValid(char ch) {\n        if(ch >= '0' && ch <= '9') return true;\n        else if(ch == ' ') return true;\n        else if(ch == '-') return true;\n        else return false;\n    }\n\npublic:\n    int myAtoi(string s) {\n        int n = s.size();\n        int ans = 0;\n        const int M = 2147483647;\n        bool sign = false;\n\n        if(!isValid(s[0])) return false;\n\n        for(int i=0; i<n; i++) {\n            if(s[i] >= '0' && s[i] <= '9') {\n                ans = (((ans%M) * 10)%M + (s[i] - '0'))%M;\n            }\n            else if(s[i] == '-') sign = true;\n            else continue;\n        }  \n\n        if(sign) ans = (-1 * (ans%M))%M;\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"string-to-integer-atoi","has_notes":false}
